nodes.content: Table and field naming conventions, required fields, and index patterns for Convex schemas with multi-tenant row-level isolation via companyId
Convex query structure, cursor-based pagination, conditional queries with skip pattern, and common anti-patterns to avoid
Convex mutation patterns for CRUD operations, soft deletes, batch operations, and the validate-auth-ownership-mutate-return flow
Convex file upload and download patterns using generateUploadUrl, signed storage URLs, and file reference management
useQuery subscription patterns, conditional subscriptions with skip, cleanup on unmount, and avoiding unnecessary re-subscriptions
Convex schema migration procedures including additive changes, data backfill patterns, and safe rollback strategies
Standard Convex error types, ConvexError usage, error boundaries for Convex queries, and client-side error handling patterns
Convex query optimization techniques, avoiding N+1 queries, batch operations, and index-driven query design
Soft delete pattern using isDeleted flag and deletedAt timestamp instead of hard deletes, enabling audit trails and data recovery
useConvexFileStorage hook wrapping generateUploadUrl with XHR progress tracking, signed URL retrieval, and file deletion
Optimistic mutation pattern using withOptimisticUpdate to update local Convex cache immediately before server confirmation with automatic rollback
Standard React component template with prop types, named exports, and consistent file structure conventions
useState, useReducer, and React Context patterns for local and shared component state
useEffect best practices including cleanup functions, dependency arrays, and avoiding common pitfalls like stale closures
useMemo, useCallback, and React.memo usage patterns for preventing unnecessary re-renders in list items and event handlers
React error boundary class component implementation with fallback UI, reset capability, and multi-level boundary strategy
React Suspense with React.lazy for route-based code splitting, lazy loading components, and fallback loading states
requireAuth, requireRole, and requireOwnership helper functions for enforcing authentication and authorization in Convex backend functions
Session validation, automatic refresh with 5-minute buffer before expiry, and logout patterns using Clerk
Role-based access control with viewer < editor < admin < owner hierarchy, permission checks, and feature gates
Subscription tier definitions (free/pro/enterprise), server-side enforcement via requireSubscription(), and client-side feature gates
Multi-step age verification gate flow with legal compliance storage, verifiedAt timestamp, and re-verification on sensitive actions
Stripe subscription lifecycle management: checkout sessions, upgrades, cancellations, and webhook processing to keep Convex in sync
Primary, secondary, ghost, and destructive button variants with consistent sizing, disabled states, and loading indicators
Input, Select, Textarea, Checkbox, and Radio form element patterns with consistent labeling, error states, and accessibility
Modal and dialog structure with focus trap, backdrop click dismiss, keyboard escape, and entrance/exit animations
Toast notification types (success/error/warning/info), queue management, positioning, and auto-dismiss with manual close
Skeleton loaders, spinners, and progress bar patterns for representing async loading states consistently across the UI
8 empty state variants with contextual messaging, CTA buttons, and optional illustrations for zero-data scenarios
Error boundary components, inline error messages, user-friendly error copy, and retry patterns with exponential backoff
Design system cards, interactive expandable cards, and dashboard metric cards with consistent padding, shadow, and hover states
Client-side form validation with Zod + react-hook-form, field-level error messages, and real-time validation feedback
Form submit handlers with loading states, optimistic updates, error handling, and success feedback patterns
Multi-step wizard form pattern with progress indicator, step navigation, sessionStorage persistence, and step validation
File upload form pattern using Convex generateUploadUrl, client-side progress tracking, preview, and file type validation
Dynamic add/remove form fields using useFieldArray from react-hook-form with optimistic UI updates and nested objects
useQuery basic usage, conditional queries with skip pattern, batch queries, and error handling for Convex real-time data fetching
useMutation call patterns, error handling, fire-and-forget analytics mutations, and batch mutation operations
Cursor-based, offset-based, limit-based, and client-side pagination patterns for Convex queries
Convex automatic caching, conditional query patterns, multi-query coordination, and server-side query optimization
React error boundary implementation with multi-level handling, specialized boundaries per feature area, and reset capability
User-friendly error message copy, error type classification, and formatting conventions for displaying errors to end users
Retry button implementations with exponential backoff, maximum retry limits, and user feedback during retry attempts
Centralized error logger with unique incident IDs, Sentry integration, and structured error tracking for support correlation
Exponential backoff retry, circuit breaker state machine, and graceful degradation patterns for Convex and external API calls
Vitest unit test setup, test structure with describe/it blocks, vi.mock for Convex functions, and assertion patterns
React Testing Library component tests with userEvent for realistic interactions, screen queries, and accessibility assertions
Integration tests with ConvexTestingHelper, auth mocking, realistic data setup, and end-to-end data flow validation
Playwright E2E test setup with page object model, data-testid selectors, and critical user journey test scenarios
Test helper functions, data factories, custom Vitest matchers, and shared test utilities for consistent test setup
useAuth hook with Clerk integration, reCAPTCHA support, signup/signin flows, and structured error handling
Subscription tier management hook with localStorage persistence, tier comparison helpers, and refresh capability
Toast notification hook with queue management, auto-dismiss timers, manual close, and typed toast variants
Safe localStorage wrapper hook with quota management, JSON serialization, error handling, and SSR safety
Debounced value hook for search input optimization, API call throttling, and input handling with configurable delay
Responsive media query hook with breakpoint detection, SSR safety, and mobile-first responsive design helpers
useAuthWithRecaptcha wraps Clerk sign-in/sign-up with reCAPTCHA v3 token generation and server-side verification before auth proceeds
Touch swipe gesture detection hook with configurable threshold, velocity check, and direction callbacks for mobile interactions
useTierGates provides client-side subscription tier checking with canAccess(), checkGate(), and declarative TierGate component
useFreemium tracks usage against free tier limits, surfaces upgrade prompts at the right moment, and provides usage meters
IntersectionObserver hook for lazy loading images, infinite scroll triggers, and scroll-based animations with triggerOnce support
Date utility functions for relative time display, timezone-aware formatting, and locale-specific date presentation
String utility functions for truncation, slugification, capitalization, and sanitization of user-generated content
Number formatting utilities for currency display, percentages, unit conversion, and locale-aware number presentation
Validation helper functions for email, URL, phone number, and custom business rule validators
Array utility functions for deduplication, groupBy, sortBy, and chunk operations on collections
Convex validator composition using v.string(), v.number(), v.object(), v.union(), v.array() with custom error messages
Client-side validation with Zod + react-hook-form, regex patterns, password matching, and real-time field validation
Zod schema definitions with type inference, validation error formatting, and LLM output validation patterns
Business logic validation patterns including rate limiting, age verification checks, and content safety enforcement
Server-side rate limiting in Convex mutations using sliding window counter stored in the database to prevent API abuse
React Router route definitions, nested route structure, route guards, and layout route patterns
useNavigate, Link component usage, programmatic navigation, and back-navigation patterns
Auth guard components, role-based route protection, and redirect patterns for unauthenticated or unauthorized access
React Context creation, provider setup, and consumer hook patterns for sharing state across component trees
App-wide state management for user preferences, theme, and cross-feature shared state using Context + Convex hybrid
Component-level state patterns, derived state computation, and state update batching for UI interactions
State persistence patterns using localStorage and sessionStorage with sync across tabs and hydration safety
Route-based code splitting with React.lazy and Suspense, dynamic imports, and chunk naming conventions
Image lazy loading with loading=lazy, decoding=async, explicit width/height, and responsive image srcset patterns
Vite manualChunks configuration for vendor, UI library, and app code separation with tree shaking optimization
React.memo, useCallback, and useMemo patterns for list item optimization, virtualization, and preventing cascade re-renders
ARIA label, role, live region, and description patterns for making dynamic content accessible to assistive technologies
Tab order management, focus trapping in modals, keyboard shortcut patterns, and focus restoration after interactions
Screen reader text patterns, live region announcements, semantic HTML structure, and visually-hidden utility classes
WCAG 2.1 AA compliance patterns for color contrast ratios, touch target sizing, and reduced motion preferences
Build scripts, environment variable management, Vite production build configuration, and pre-build validation steps
Vercel deployment configuration, environment variable setup, custom domain configuration, and Convex cloud deployment
Pre-deploy validation checklist, smoke test procedures, rollback steps, and post-deploy monitoring verification
Ralph Loop core execution engine: iterates PRD tasks, dispatches to agents, runs quality gates, and persists state with sequential and parallel modes
ParallelRunner executes independent tasks concurrently using Promise.all with configurable concurrency limit and per-task timeout
LLM Council runs ARCHITECT, REVIEWER, IMPLEMENTER agents to vote on critical task outputs; consensus determines approval or rejection
Gate runner validates LLM responses: hard limits first (non-negotiable), then response-validation, mercury-validator, schema-validation, typescript-check
Prompt builder injects dependency task outputs, session memory context, and agent system prompts to give each agent full context
Todo tracking system breaks complex tasks into pending/in_progress/completed sub-steps with single in_progress constraint and agent-specific verification criteria
Auto test-fix-retest loop runs tsc and vitest after code-producing agents, prompts LLM to fix failures, retries up to maxRetries times
AgentSchemas registry maps all 21 agent names to Zod schemas; callLLMWithSchema requests structured JSON and validates against schema
Model router selects LLM by tier (free/paid/hybrid) and complexity, then walks fallback chain (Ollama -> OpenAI -> Anthropic) on failure
SQLite-backed LLM response cache keyed by SHA-256(prompt+model+temperature) with TTL expiry, hit tracking, and getOrCompute helper
SmartRetrySystem classifies errors and escalates: same model with context -> stronger model -> context chunking -> council-of-agents prompt
Cross-session persistent memory ranked by confidence x accessCount; buildMemoryContext injects critical constraints, agent patterns, and task-relevant memories into prompts
Static security scanner detects secrets, SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, insecure randomness, and ReDoS patterns; also runs npm audit
NovaTracer wraps Langfuse for structured observability: traces LLM calls, gate results, and council votes per task; gracefully degrades if unconfigured
SQLite checkpoint system saves build state every 30s and after each task; getLatestCheckpoint enables crash recovery and build resumption
